song.title: Why So Serious (dAfUNK remix)
song.info:
Originally a song called "Why So Serious" by Hans Zimmer and James Newton Howard. This remix first appeared in January of 2010 on SceneSat's podcast, "[url=http://scenesat.com/playlist/54]Sat-U-Rated"[/url]. Later appeared on SceneSat's [url=http://scenesat.com/playlist/68]Breakpoint 2010 weekend part 1[/url] podcast.
Lyrics: Why so serious?
He doesn't like that. Not. One. Bit.
Let's put a smile on that face!
[My father] was... a drinker. And a fiend. And one night he goes off crazier than usual. Mommy gets the kitchen knife to defend herself. He doesn't like that. Not. One. Bit. So, me watching, he takes the knife to her, laughing while he does it. He turns to me, and he says, "Why so serious?" He comes at me with the knife. "Why so serious?" He sticks the blade in my mouth. "Let's put a smile on that face!" Aaand...
Why so serious?
